Chart.js

Mind the Gap

A beautiful, interactive visualization of US occupations. Awarded Best Web App and Top Team at PixelHacks 2019.

> Go to website > View on Github

Mind the Gap was created at PixelHacks III, a 24-hour hackathon held at Ernst and Young.
